item.title: US-83 South/US-14 West at SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck
item.description: US-83 South/US-14 West (Pierre St.) at SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck (Sioux Ave.). Turn right on Sioux Ave for US-83 South/US-14 West/SD-34 West. Turn left on Sioux Ave. for SD-34 East/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North at US-14/US-83 Truck Route
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North (Sioux Ave.) at US-14/US-83 Truck Route (Pierre St.). Turn left on Pierre St. for US-14 East/US-83 North. Continue east on Sioux St. for SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck. The truck route bypasses a low railroad bridge just north of this intersection.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North - Pierre
item.description: Entering Pierre on US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North. Pierre is the capital of South Dakota and is the 9th largest city in the state. Pierre is pronounced PEER.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North - Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone
item.description: Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone on US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North. The county/time zone boundary is on the Missouri River bridge.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806 in Fort Pierre. Turn right for US-83 South/SD-1806 South. Turn left for US-83 North/US-14 East/SD-34 East. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 East across the river into Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching US-83
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching US-83 in Fort Pierre. Turn left to continue east on US-14/SD-34 and for US-83 north. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 across the Missouri River into Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East - Fort Pierre
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East in Fort Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East - Fort Pierre
item.description: Entering Fort Pierre on US-14/SD-34 East. Fort Pierre is the county seat of Stanley County, and is directly across the Missouri River from Pierre. Fort Pierre is also in Mountain Time, while across the river the city of Pierre is in Central Time.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East at SD-1806 in Fort Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching at SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching at SD-1806 North to Oahe Dam. Continue east on US-14/SD-34 to Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching SD-1806. SD-1806 is named for the year Lewis and Clark made their return journey through North and South Dakota.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34 in Stanley County. Turn left for SD-34 West/SD-63 North; right for US-14/SD-34 East.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34 in Stanley County. SD-63 North joins SD-34 westbound; SD-34 east joins US-14 eastbound.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North Approaching SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North approaching SD-34. Use US-14 East/SD-34 East to Pierre; SD-34 East/SD-64 north to Sturgis (via SD-34) and Eagle Butte (via SD-63).

item.title: US-14 East at SD-63
item.description: US-14 East at SD-63 in Midland. Use SD-63 south to I-90 junction. Continue on US-14/SD-63 for Pierre. SD-63 north joins US-14 eastbound.

item.title: US-14 East Approaching SD-63
item.description: US-14 East approaching SD-63 in Midland.

item.title: US-14 East at SD-73
item.description: US-14 East at SD-73 in Phillip. Use SD-73 south to Kadoka; SD-73 north to Faith. Continue east on US-14 for Pierre.

item.title: US-14 East Approaching SD-73
item.description: US-14 East approaching SD-73 in Phillip.

item.title: US-14 East - Jackson County
item.description: Entering Jackson County on US-14 east.

item.title: US-14 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-14 east. Distance to Cottonwood, Phillip, and Pierre.

item.title: US-14 East - Quinn
item.description: Entering Quinn - Population 63 on US-14 east.

item.title: US-14 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-14. Distance to Quinn and Phillip.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 112
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 112 - US-14/Phillip/Pierre/State Capital. US-14 leaves I-90 eastbound here.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 110
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 110 - SD-240/Badlands Loop Scenic Byway/Glenn St. This is the eastern end of the Wall business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 110
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 110 - SD-240/Badlands Loop Scenic Byway/Glenn St.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 109
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 109 - BL-90/W 4th Ave. This is the western end of the Wall business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Wall Next 2 Exits
item.description: Wall Next 2 Exits on I-90 East

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 107
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 107 - Cedar Butte Road.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 101
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 101 - Jensen Road.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 98
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 90 - Wasta/Base Line Road.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 90
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 90 - 173rd Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 88
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 88 - 171st Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 84
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 84 - 167th Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 78
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 78 - New Underwood/161st Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 67A and 67B
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 67A - Southbound Liberty Blvd. Approaching Exit 67B - Northbound Liberty Blvd./Ellsworth AFB.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 67A-B
item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 67A-B - Liberty Blvd/Box Elder/Ellsworth AFB

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 63
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 62 - Box Elder/Ellsworth AFB/Commercial Gate.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-90 east. Distance to Box Elder, Ellsworth AFB, and Sioux Falls.

item.title: US-16 East Truck/SD-79 North at I-90/US-14
item.description: US-16 East Truck/SD-79 North at I-90/US-14 (Exit 61). Use I-90/US-14 West/SD-79 North to Gillette (Wyoming). Use I-90/US-14 East to Sioux Falls. SD-79 North joins I-90/US-14 West to Sturgis. This is the eastern end of US-16 Truck.

item.title: WY-116 North at BL-90/US-14
item.description: WY-116 north at BL-90/US-14. Turn right on BL-90/US-14 East for WY-585 and Sundance (City Center). Turn left for US-14 West to I-90 and Devils Tower.

item.title: US-14 East at I-90 West (Exit 185)
item.description: US-14 east at I-90 West (Exit 185). Use I-90 west for Moorcroft. Continue east on US-14 for I-90 East, WY-116 and Sundance (City Center). The is the beginning of the I-90 Business Loop in Sundance.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 185
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 185 - To WY-116/Sundance.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 189
item.description: I-90/US-14 West at Exit 189 - BL-90/US-14 West/Sundance. US-14 leaves I-90 here and heads northwest to the Devils Tower National Monument. This is the eastern end of the Sundance business loop.

item.title: I-90 West at WY-111
item.description: I-90 west offramp (Exit 199) at WY-111. Use WY-111 north for Alladin, Heulett, and Devils Tower (National Monument).

item.title: End WY-111 South at I-90 (Exit 199)
item.description: WY-111 south at I-90/US-14 (Exit 199). Use I-90/US-14 East for Beulah; west for Sundance.

item.title: I-90/US-14 West Onramp
item.description: I-90/US-14 West onramp (Exit 10) at west end of Spearfish business loop. Turn left for I-90/US-14 west; straight for US-85 North. The Exit 10 interchange is under construction when this photo was taken.

item.title: US-85 North at I-90/US-14 West
item.description: US-85 North at I-90/US-14 West (Exit 10). Turn left for US-14 and I-90 west. Interchange is currently under construction, and most of the traffic signs are temporary.

item.title: I-90/US-14 East at US-85
item.description: I-90/US-14 East (Exit 10) at US-85. Turn left for US-85 North to Belle Fourche. Turn right for BL-90 to Spearfish.

item.title: End BL-90 West at I-90
item.description: End BL-90 west at I-90/US-14 West/US-85 South Jct. Turn right for I-90/US-14 East/US-85 South.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 10
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 10 - BL-90/US-85 North/North Ave./Belle Fourche. US-85 joins I-90 east through Spearfish.

item.title: I-90 East Approaching Exit 10
item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 10 - BL-90/US-85 North/Belle Fourche/North Ave. This is the western end of the Spearfish business loop. US-85 joins I-90 eastbound through Spearfish.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 8
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 8 - Mc Guigan Road/Black Hills National Forest.

item.title: I-90/US-14 East - Spearfish Exits
item.description: Spearfish - Next 4 Exits on I-90/US-14 East.

item.title: I-90 East Onramp
item.description: I-90 east onramp at Exit 2, in rural Lawrence County, South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 2 Mc Nenny State Fish Hatchery. This is the first exit eastbound on I-90 in South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 1 - Mc Nenny State Fish Hatchery. This is the first exit on I-90 eastbound in South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on I-90 east in South Dakota. Distance to Spearfish, Sturgis, and Rapid City.

item.title: I-90 East/US-14 East
item.description: I-90/US-14 East shields. These are the first I-90/US-14 reassurance markers in South Dakota on I-90/US-14 east.

item.title: I-90 East - Welcome To South Dakota
item.description: Welcome to South Dakota on I-90 east. Milemarkers for both Wyoming and South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 205
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 205 - Beulah. This is the last exit on I-90 eastbound in Wyoming.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 205
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 205 - Beulah. This is the last exit in Wyoming along I-90 east.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-90 east to Beulah, and Spearfish, SD. Taken just east of WY-111 junction.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 199
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 199 - WY-111/Aladdin.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 191
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 191 - Moskee Road.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 189
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 189 - Sundance. This is the east end of the Sundance business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 185
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 185 - BL-90/US-14 West/To WY-116/Sundance. This is the western end of the Sundance business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 153
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 153 - To US-14/US-16/Moorcroft/Newcastle. US-14 and US-16 leave I-90 east here. Use this exit for the Moorcroft Rest Area.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-90/US-14/US-16 east in Campbell County, Wyoming. Distance to Moorcroft, Sundance, and Newcastle (via US-16).

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 141
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 141 - Rozet.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 132
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 132 - Wyodak Road. The smokestacks in the background are from the Wyodak Power Plant, part of the Wyodak Coalmine complex.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 129 - Garner Lake Road.

item.title: US-14/US-16 East/WY-59 South at WY-50 (To I-90)
item.description: US-14/US-16 East/WY-59 South at WY-50 (To I-90). Continue ahead on US-14/US-16 east for I-90 to Douglas and Moorcroft. Turn right for I-90 West (WY-50) for Buffalo.

item.title: BL-90/US-14/US-16 East at WY-59
item.description: BL-90/US-14/US-16 east at WY-59. Turn right for I-90 (west)/WY-59 South to Douglas. Continue straight ahead for I-90 east.

item.title: US-14/US-16 West/WY-59 North/To I-90
item.description: US-14/US-16 West, WY-59 North, To I-90 (Business I-90) in Gillette.

item.title: BL-90/US-14/US-16 West at WY-59
item.description: BL-90/US-14/US-16 west at WY-59. Turn left for I-90 (west)/WY-59 South to Douglas. Continue straight ahead for BL-90/US-14/US-16 West and WY-59 North. WY-59 follows US-14/US-16 through Gillette.

item.title: Begin BL-90 at I-90
item.description: Begin BL-90 at I-90 west onramp (Exit 128). Use I-90 west for Buffalo. Continue west for BL-90/US-14/US-16 into Gillette.

item.title: I-90 East at WY-51/US-14/US-16
item.description: I-90 east Exit 128 at BL-90/US-14/US-16/WY-51. Use BL-90/US-14/US-16 west for Gillette and Port of Entry.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 128
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 128 - Port of Entry. This is the east end of the Gillette business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 124 and 126
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 124 - BL-90/US-14/US-16 West/WY-50/Gillette. Approaching Exit 126 - WY-59/Gillette/Douglas.

item.title: End BL-90 West at I-90/US-14/US-87
item.description: End BL-90/Bus. US-14 West/Bus. US-87 North at I-90/US-14/US-87. Use I-90/US-14 West/US-87 north for Billings (Montana); use I-90/US-14 East/US-87 South for Buffalo. This is the western end of the Sheridan business loop.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 25 Offramp at US-14/BL-90
item.description: Bottom of I-90 East, Exit 25 offramp in Sheridan. Turn right for US-14 east to Ucross; left for BL-90 for Downtown Sheridan. Also turn left for (unsigned) US-87 to Big Horn. This is the eastern end of the Sheridan business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 25
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 25 - BL-90/US-14 East/Sheridan/Big Horn/Ucross. This is the eastern end of the Sheridan business loop. US-14 leaves I-90 here and heads east towards Ucross. US-87 also leaves I-90 east here.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 23
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 23 - WY-336/Main St.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 20
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 20 - BL-90/Main St. This is the western end of the Sheridan Business Loop. The style of this overhead is not usual in Wyoming, and looks like the type of overheads seen in California.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 16
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 16 - WY-339/Decker, Mont.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 9
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 9 - US-14 West/Ranchester/Dayton/Greybull/Lovell/Yellowstone - Teton National Parks. I-90/US-14/US-87 continues east towards Sheridan and Buffalo. US-14 joins I-90 east to Sheridan.

item.title: US-14 East At WY-343
item.description: US-14 east at WY-343 north.

item.title: US-14 East Approaching WY-343
item.description: US-14 east approaching WY-343 east in Dayton.

item.title: End US-14A At US-14 - Burgess Jct.
item.description: End US-14A at US-14 - Burgess Jct. Turn right for US-14 west to Shell and Greybull; turn left for US-14 east to Dayton and Sheridan. There is also a Bighorn Scenic Byway sign, of which either direction US-14 is part of.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310. Turn right on US-310 West/WY-789 north for Lovell and Billings (Montana). This is the eastern end of US-310. WY-789 leaves US-14/US-16/US-20 here and turns west onto US-310.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 at US-310/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789. Use US-14/US-16/US-20 West for Cody and Yellowstone. Turn right to continue north WY-789. This is the southern terminus of US-310.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789 North. Turn right to continue on WY-789 North. This is where US-310 begins.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North leaving Greybull.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-14
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-14 in Greybull. Turn right for US-14 east to Shell and Sheridan. Continue west on US-14/US-16/US-20 for Lovell, Cody, and Yellowstone.

item.title: US-14 Scenic Byway Information on US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North
item.description: Scenic Byway information for US-14 on US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North approaching Greybull. Use US-14 East for the Big Horn Scenic Byway.
